patthana1.5:340.1: Anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnaanupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.5:358.1_0: Nahetuyā catuvīsati, naārammaṇe catuvīsati, naadhipatiyā catuvīsati, naanantare catuvīsati,
patthana1.5:358.1_1: nasamanantare catuvīsati, nasahajāte vīsati, naaññamaññe vīsati, nanissaye vīsati,
patthana1.5:358.1_2: naupanissaye tevīsati, napurejāte tevīsati, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane catuvīsati,
patthana1.5:358.1_3: nakamme catuvīsati, navipāke catuvīsati, naāhāre vīsati, naindriye bāvīsati, najhāne
patthana1.5:358.1_4: catuvīsati, namagge catuvīsati, nasampayutte vīsati, navippayutte cuddasa, noatthiyā
patthana1.5:358.1_5: nava, nonatthiyā catuvīsati, novigate catuvīsati, noavigate nava.
patthana1.5:360.1: Yathā kusalattike paccanīyagaṇanā vitthāritā, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
patthana1.5:362.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana1.5:362.1_1: satta, naaññamaññe cattāri, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta,
patthana1.5:362.1_2: naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta,
patthana1.5:362.1_3: najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte cattāri, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā
patthana1.5:363.1_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare
patthana1.5:363.1_1: satta …pe… naaññamaññe cattāri …pe… navipāke cattāri …pe… nasampayutte cattāri, navippayutte
patthana1.5:366.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare satta, samanantare satta,
patthana1.5:366.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye ekādasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte satta,
patthana1.5:366.1_2: pacchājāte nava, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke cha, āhāre dvādasa, indriye satta,
patthana1.5:366.1_3: jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte dasa, atthiyā tevīsati, natthiyā
